projectCards.dataTags: p5.js web audio api hci html neuro-computing frontend ux ui javascript cognitive modeling interactive design neuroscience
projectCards.title: The Flow State
bulletPoints: Built an experimental focus tool replacing traditional timers with generative visuals and sound to support sustained attention and deep-work habits.
Engineered a linear temporal density algorithm that converts elapsed time into progressive spatial complexity, informed by predictive processing models.
Built a dual-oscillator Web Audio engine modulating binaural beat frequencies along a controlled arousal curve aligned with the Yerkes–Dodson law.
Designed a peripheral-awareness UI using translucency and motion to offload temporal monitoring to peripheral vision, reducing central executive load.

projectCards.dataTags: python pytorch ml hpc fmri neuroimaging regression analysis nlp cnn transformers multimodal data
projectCards.title: Predicting Neural Responses to Multimodal Stimuli
projectCards.problem: The Problem: Understanding how the brain responds to naturalistic stimuli (movies/TV) by linking fMRI activity to audiovisual and linguistic inputs.
bulletPoints: Developed a multimodal ML pipeline in Python using PyTorch, scikit-learn, and nilearn to predict voxelwise neural responses.
Extracted features using CNNs (AlexNet), transformers (HuBERT), and NLP embeddings (RoBERTa).
Ranked 27th out of 200+ international teams in the 2025 Algonauts Challenge.
Optimized ridge regression models through dimensionality reduction (PCA) and hyperparameter tuning on HPC clusters.
